item.title: Sofware Engineer QA Lead (san mateo)
item.description:
Senior Software Engineer QA Lead

Work as the lead QA engineer at a company that already has traction in the market and (effectively) thousands of volunteer testers.
* A talented, responsible, lead QA engineer who is passionate about product quality
* Is enough of a developer in multiple languages/platforms to be dangerous (or at least to test our products well)
* Thrives in an environment with lots of change, who is excited to learn and likes to test their mettle
* Must be willing to work locally out of the office.
* Ideal candidates will have experience testing Integrated Development Environments (IDEs) like Dreamweaver, Eclipse, NetBeans

Please send resume and cover letter to impress.
item.dc:title: Sofware Engineer QA Lead (san mateo)
